short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks the user's hours throughout the day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Very simple extension that allows user to keep track of number of hours they spend on any given task. Users should install it if they want to know how much time they are spending on a given task over a period of time. Just click on the extension and then enter a number and click 'Add Hours'. You can set a goal by right clicking the extension and selecting Options. Once the goal is met, a notification will be shown at the bottom of the screen. Source code is available here - https://github.com/vsha041/Tracker
